author: leeandheidi
title: Vaccinations in Delhi.
text: # 1 I know. We should get our vaccinations beforehand. Living in the US with crappy health insurance is going to set me and my wife back literally hundreds (if not over a thousand) dollars. So, we are flying (one way) to Delhi in Feb and are staying for 5 months. Not quite sorted out our itinerary but we want to do as much as possible and also visit Nepal and Sri Lanka. So... we are looking to get our shots in Delhi. My questions are: What shots are a must in your opinion? Is there any recommendations of clinics/hospitals to get the shots done?
